# Open Agent School - llms.txt
# https://llmstxt.org/ - A standard for providing context to LLMs

> Open Agent School is a comprehensive educational platform for mastering AI agents,
> from foundational concepts to production-ready agentic systems.

## About

Open Agent School teaches developers, architects, and product managers to build
AI agents through interactive learning, hands-on practice, and real-world patterns.

## Core Topics

### Agent Fundamentals
- AI Agent Architecture & Lifecycle
- Agent Reasoning & Tool Use
- Memory Systems & Context Management

### Communication Protocols
- Model Context Protocol (MCP) - Context and tool standardization
- Agent-to-Agent (A2A) Communication - Inter-agent messaging
- Agent Communication Protocol (ACP) - Unified agent interoperability

### CLI Coding Agents (NEW)
- Copilot CLI - GitHub's command suggestions
- Claude Code - Anthropic's agentic coding with CLAUDE.md
- Codex CLI - OpenAI's terminal agent with approval modes
- Gemini CLI - Google's multimodal CLI agent
- AGENTS.md configuration for project context

### Agent Skills (NEW)
- SKILL.md specification for modular agent expertise
- Progressive disclosure for context efficiency
- Skill discovery and activation triggers
- Security considerations for third-party skills

### Agent Red Teaming (NEW)
- Proactive AI security testing methodology
- PyRIT (Python Risk Identification Tool) framework
- Attack types: Direct Injection, Metaprompt Extraction, Multi-turn (Crescendo), XPIA, Guardrail Bypass
- Risk categories: 7 model+agent risks, 3 agent-specific risks
- Attack Success Rate (ASR) metrics
- NIST AI RMF: Map → Measure → Manage

### Evaluation & Safety
- Agent Evaluation Methodologies
- AI Safety & Governance (Azure AI Content Safety, Responsible AI)
- Critical Thinking Frameworks (Bloom's, Paul-Elder)

### 2026 Agent Patterns (NEW)
- Skill-Augmented Agent - SKILL.md capability extension for domain expertise
- MCP Server Orchestration - Multi-MCP server federation with unified tool layer
- Multi-LLM Routing - OpenRouter-style intelligent model routing by task/cost
- Agentic IDE - VS Code/Cursor workspace agents with full IDE access
- Guardrails Layer - Real-time safety filtering and policy enforcement

### Production Foundations (NEW)
- Agent Reasoning Patterns - CoT, ToT, GoT, ReAct for structured thinking
- Agent Memory Systems - Short-term, long-term, episodic, semantic architectures
- Agent Observability - Tracing, debugging, monitoring with OpenTelemetry
- Agent Testing & Benchmarks - SWE-Bench, GAIA, evaluation frameworks
- Prompt Injection Defense - Security patterns against injection attacks
- Human-in-the-Loop Patterns - Approval workflows, escalation, oversight
- Agent Cost Optimization - Token budgets, caching, model routing, batch processing

### Advanced Topics
- Multi-Agent Systems & Orchestration
- Data Autonomy Patterns
- Fine-Tuning Methods (SFT, DPO, RFT)
- Quantum-Enhanced AI & Robotics
- Agentic Commerce & Enterprise Applications

### Applied & Career (NEW)
- Agent Troubleshooting Playbook - Systematic debugging for production agent failures
- Agent Economics - Cost models, pricing strategies, ROI frameworks
- Agent Career Paths - Roles, skills, certifications, salary guides ($80K-$300K)
- Industry-Specific Agents - Healthcare, Finance, Legal, Education, Manufacturing, Retail patterns
- Agent Templates Hub - Ready-to-use starters, quickstart guides, boilerplates

## Key URLs

- Homepage: https://www.openagentschool.org/
- Concepts Hub: https://www.openagentschool.org/concepts/
- Agent Patterns: https://www.openagentschool.org/patterns/
- Study Mode: https://www.openagentschool.org/study-mode/
- AI Skills Explorer: https://www.openagentschool.org/ai-skills/

- Skill-Augmented Agent: https://www.openagentschool.org/patterns/skill-augmented-agent

- Guardrails Layer: https://www.openagentschool.org/patterns/guardrails-layer

- CLI Coding Agents: https://www.openagentschool.org/concepts/client-coding-agents

- Agent Red Teaming: https://www.openagentschool.org/concepts/agent-red-teaming

- Agent Reasoning Patterns: https://www.openagentschool.org/concepts/agent-reasoning-patterns
- Agent Memory Systems: https://www.openagentschool.org/concepts/agent-memory-systems
- Agent Observability: https://www.openagentschool.org/concepts/agent-observability

- Prompt Injection Defense: https://www.openagentschool.org/concepts/prompt-injection-defense
- Human-in-the-Loop Patterns: https://www.openagentschool.org/concepts/human-in-the-loop-patterns
- Agent Cost Optimization: https://www.openagentschool.org/concepts/agent-cost-optimization

## Technical Stack

- Frontend: React 18 + TypeScript + Vite + TailwindCSS
- Visualizations: D3.js for interactive diagrams
- Backend (optional): Python FastAPI microservices

## Contact

- GitHub: https://github.com/bhakthan/OpenAgentSchool
- Website: https://www.openagentschool.org
